cn:
IsoplotR 是由 Pieter Vermeesch 使用 R 语言编写的开源软件, 灵活且具体后期可二次开发性. 该软件致敬了 Ken Ludwig 当年编写的 Excel 插件 Isoplot. IsoplotR 并不基于 Isoplot. 本程序支持如下的同位素组合: U-Pb, Pb-Pb, 40Ar/39Ar, K-Ca, Rb-Sr, Sm-Nd, Lu-Hf, Re-Os, U-Th-He, 裂变径迹(fission track)以及U系列元素的不平衡定年(U-series disequilibrium dating), 以及碎屑锆石的年代学数据(detrital geochronology).

这个翻译是由严爽, 于瘸子, 郭宏程, 张培, 方浩 和 李四 完成的. 目的是为中文用户提供一个简单易用的图形界面, 以使用 IsoplotR 所提供的基本功能 (更多简介请点击 这里来访问简单指南 获取更多 信息). 其实这里的图形界面所包含的功能以及更多可定制的功能都可以通过命令行版本的 IsoplotR 包来实现, 现已托管在 CRAN 和 GitHub. 请联系p.vermeesch[at]ucl.ac.uk报告翻译错误或提出改进软件的建议。
en:
IsoplotR is an R package for geochronology that was designed to be free, flexible and future-proof. The package was named after but is not based on Ken Ludwig's popular Isoplot add-in to Microsoft Excel. It implements functions for U-Pb, Pb-Pb, 40Ar/39Ar, K-Ca, Rb-Sr, Sm-Nd, Lu-Hf, Re-Os, U-Th-He, fission track and U-series disequilibrium dating as well as detrital geochronology.

This website provides easy to use point-and-click access to IsoplotR's most commonly used functions (see the TUTORIAL for details). Alternatively, the same functions (and more) can also be accessed from the command-line through the IsoplotR package on CRAN and GitHub.

IsoplotR is currently available in English and Chinese. If you would like to help translate the software into other languages (Russian, Arabic, Welsh, ...), then please contact p.vermeesch[at]ucl.ac.uk. Bug reports and feature requests should be sent to the same email address.

cn: 1. <tt>IsoplotR</tt>的图形界面有四个主要的控制部分: 顶部菜单可以来选择所使用的同位素组合, 投图的设置选项, 以及帮助文档. 底部的输入和存储菜单, 可以打开本地文件进行数据导入, 还可以将做好的图保存下来. 右侧的是投图输出的界面, 生成的图像就在这部分. 左侧的是表格化的数据显示界面, 导入的数据就在这里面.
en: 1. <tt>IsoplotR</tt>'s graphical user interface (GUI) has four components: a top bar with selection menus for the various chronometers and plot devices, optional settings and documentation; an input table into which data can be pasted from spreadsheet applications; an output window displaying the graphical or numerical results; and a lower bar to import and export data and results.

cn: 2. 点击 <tt>Options</tt> 按钮可以选用其他格式的输入文件.
en: 2. Alternative input formats are available through the <tt>Options</tt> menu.

cn: 3. 在 <tt>Options</tt> 菜单内有很多内置的上下文帮助文档对一 些概念做了简要的解释.
en: 3. Contextual help can be accessed by clicking on any text within the <tt>Options</tt> menu.

cn: 4. 点击<tt>Help</tt>菜单可以看到详细的文档.其中包括输和入输出的参数, 还包含本软件所用的理论基础的概要总结, 以及相关的参考文献出处.
en: 4. Further documentation is provided under the <tt>Help</tt> menu. This includes information about the input and output parameters, and a brief summary of the theoretical background with essential references.

cn: 5. 数据以及投图设置等等都可以用<tt>.json</tt> 的格式来保存,这 种保存好的文件还可以随时加载到程序中去.
en: 5. Data and settings can be saved in a <tt>.json</tt> database format for future use.

en: Optional variable to be used as fill colours in concordia and radial plots.

cn: 如果忽略<tt>rhoXY</tt>, <tt>rhoXZ</tt> 和 <tt>rhoYZ</tt>，那么它们的值将参考这三组标准误差(<tt>s[X]</tt>, <tt>s[Y]</tt> and <tt>s[Z]</tt>)之间的冗余。该推断假定这些误差是基于相同数量的数据点。假如因为同质异位素干扰、仪器问题、异常值剔除或者其它原因导致某些数据仅仅不服从其中一个比值，那么这个方法将不起作用。
en: If <tt>rhoXY</tt>, <tt>rhoXZ</tt> or <tt>rhoYZ</tt> are omitted, then their value will be inferred from the redundancy between the three sets of standard errors (<tt>s[X]</tt>, <tt>s[Y]</tt> and <tt>s[Z]</tt>). This inference assumes that these errors are based on the same number of data points. If some data has been rejected from one ratio but not another, because of isobaric interferences, instrument issues, outlier rejection, or any other reason, then this method will not work.

cn: 这是 IsoplotR/IsoplotRgui GitHub 版本
如果使用本软件,请引用软件开发者 Pieter Vermeesch 所发表的这篇相关文章:

en: The estimated uncertainty (standard error) of the <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>U-ages.
The estimated uncertainty (standard error) of the <sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U-ages.
The estimated uncertainty (standard error) of the <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb-ages.
The estimated uncertainty (standard error) of the <sup>208</sup>Pb/<sup>232</sup>Th-ages.

cn: 单颗粒协和年龄。这是协和线与(<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>U-<sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U) 误差椭圆的极大似然交叉点。
en: The single-grain concordia age. This is the maximum likelihood intersection between the (Wetherill) concordia line and the (<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>U-<sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U) error ellipse.

cn: 单颗粒协和年龄估算误差（标准误差）。
en: The estimated uncertainty (standard error) of the single-grain concordia age.

cn: p值表示协和性。注意：不建议采用p值判断协和性。采用p值作为误差传递算法的会导致高精度的数据通常难以通过chi-sauqre检验，因此最终年龄的误差被放大，受到”惩罚”，而低精度年龄相对可能被“放过”.
en: The p-value for concordance. Note: it would be unwise to use the p-value value as a concordance filter. Doing so would 'punish' high precision measurements, which are more likely to fail the Chi-square test than low precision measurements. The latter would therefore be 'rewarded' by such a criterion.

cn: Pb-Pb Ar-Ar Rb-Sr Sm-Nd Re-Os Lu-Hf U-Th-He 裂变径迹 230Th-234U-238U 230Th-238U 年龄的估算误差（标准误差）。
en: The estimated uncertainty (standard error) of the  Pb-Pb Ar-Ar Rb-Sr Sm-Nd Re-Os Lu-Hf U-Th-He fission track 230Th-234U-238U 230Th-238U  ages.

cn: 初始<sup>234</sup>U/<sup>230</sup>Th比值估算误差（标准误差）。
en: Estimated uncertainty (standard error) of the initial <sup>234</sup>U/<sup>230</sup>Th-ratio.

cn: <sup>230</sup>Th-<sup>234</sup>U-<sup>238</sup>U年龄和初始<sup>234</sup>U/<sup>230</sup>Th标准误差之间的相关系数。
en: Correlation coefficient between the <sup>230</sup>Th-<sup>234</sup>U-<sup>238</sup>U age and the initial <sup>234</sup>U/<sup>230</sup>Th-ratio uncertainties.

cn: 辐射常数及其分析误差
en: Irradiation constant and its analytical uncertainty

cn: 各阶段的<sup>39</sup>Ar 数量，标准化为X轴的年龄谱（可选择的）。
en: Amount of <sup>39</sup>Ar in each heating step, which will be normalised to form the X-axis of the age spectrum (optional).

cn: <tt>IsoplotR</tt>使用三组比值的冗余来计算它们各自分析误差的相关性。
en: <tt>IsoplotR</tt> uses the redundancy of the three ratios to calculate the correlation between their respective analytical uncertainties.

cn:
设t = {t1, ..., tn}为根据同一样本的不同等分样品确定的n个年龄估计值的集合，s[t1], ..., s[tn]}为他们的测量误差（标准误差）。IsoplotR利用两种方法来计算这些数据的平均值：
  1. 具有两个方差源的随机效应模型:

    ti ~ N( μ, σ2 = s[ti]2 + ω2 ) (eq. 1a)，

    其中 μ 是平均值, σ 2 是方差和， ω 是'过离散'. 方程1a可以通过最大似然法求的μ and ω
  2. 假设不同等分试样之间存在任何离散仅是由于分析不确定性造成的加权均值算法：

    t = Σ(ti/s[ti]2)/Σ(1/s[ti]2)(eq. 1b)。

IsoplotR使用修改版的Chauvenet标准检测异常值：
  1. 计算n个年龄值的误差加权平均值 ti 利用他们分析的不确定性s[ti] 利用上述两种方法之一.
  2. 对每一个ti, 计算概率pi that that |t-μ|>|ti-μ| for

    t ~ N(0,Ξ2) (eq. 2)

    where Ξ = √s[ti]2+ω2 如果使用随机效应模型; or Ξ = s[t]√ MSWD 如果使用普通加权平均.
  3. 设定 pj ≡ min(p1,…,pn). 如果pj<0.05/n, 则拒绝年龄值 jth，将n减1，重复步骤1到3, 直到最后年龄通过第三步. 如果与年龄之间的散布相比, 分析的误差较小, 则此通用算法可简化为常规的Chauvenet准则. 如果分析的误差很大, 并且数据没有出现任何过度分散, 则启发式异常值检测方法等同于与Ludwig（2003）“改进的2-sigma”方法.
en:
Let t = {t1, ..., tn} be a set of n age estimates determined on different aliquots of the same sample, and let s[t1], ..., s[tn]} be their analytical uncertainties (standard errors). IsoplotR implements two ways to compute the average of these data:
  1. A random effects model with two sources of variance:

    ti ~ N( μ, σ2 = s[ti]2 + ω2 ) (eq. 1a)

    where μ is the mean, σ2 is the total variance and ω is the 'overdispersion'. Equation 1a can be solved for μ and ω by the method of maximum likelihood.
  2. A weighted mean algorithm that assumes that any dispersion between the different aliquots is only due to the analytical uncertainty:

    t = Σ(ti/s[ti]2)/Σ(1/s[ti]2)(eq. 1b)

IsoplotR uses a modified version of Chauvenet's criterion for outlier detection:
  1. Compute the error-weighted mean of the n age determinations ti using their analytical uncertainties s[ti] using one of the aforementioned two approaches.
  2. For each ti, compute the probability pi that that |t-μ|>|ti-μ| for

    t ~ N(0,Ξ2) (eq. 2)

    where Ξ = √s[ti]2+ω2 if the random effects model is used; or Ξ = s[t]√ MSWD if the ordinary weighted mean is used.
  3. Let pj ≡ min(p1,…,pn). If pj<0.05/n, then reject the jth date, reduce n by one (i.e., n → (n-1) and repeat steps 1 through 3 until the surviving dates pass the third step.
If the analytical uncertainties are small compared to the scatter between the dates, then this generalised algorithm reduces to the conventional Chauvenet criterion. If the analytical uncertainties are large and the data do not exhibit any overdispersion, then the heuristic outlier detection method is equivalent to Ludwig (2003)'s 'modified 2-sigma' method.

cn: μ 100(1-α)%置信区间的宽度。这在图中也显示为灰色带。 与随机不确定性相关的误差以深灰色显示，而系统不确定性（即J因子和衰减常数）以浅灰色显示。
en: the width of the 100(1-α)% confidence interval for μ. This is also shown as a grey band on the plot. The uncertainties associated with the random uncertainties are shown in dark grey, whereas the systematic uncertainties (i.e. J-factor and decay constant) are shown in light grey.

cn: 含有过度分散的t的近似100(1-α)%置信区间，计算方式为z = y√ MSWD（未报告随机效应模型）。
en: the approximate 100(1-α)% confidence interval for t with overdispersion, calculated as z = y√MSWD (not reported for random effects models).

cn: 均一的年龄的加权偏离均方根（MSWD）。 MSWD值>> 1表示相对于所描述的分析误差，年龄过于分散。
en: the Mean Square of the Weighted Deviates (MSWD) for age homogeneity. MSWD values >> 1 indicate that the ages are overdispersed with respect to the stated analytical uncertainties.

cn: 年龄均一性检验的卡方p值。 p值<< 0.05表示，相对于所述分析误差，年龄过于分散。
en: the Chi-squared p-value for the age homogeneity test. p-values << 0.05 indicate that the ages are overdispersed with respect to the stated analytical uncertainties.

cn: 去除分析误差后的真实年龄的标准偏差。 如果MSWD明显大于1，则散度显著大于零。 散度的100(1-α)%正常置信区间显示为一组虚线。
en: the standard deviation of the true ages after removal of the analytical uncertainties. The dispersion is significantly greater than zero if the MSWD is significantly greater than one. The 100(1-α)% Normal confidence region for the dispersion (e.g., 1.96 × ω if α = 0.05) is shown as a set of dashed lines.

cn:
经验累积分布函数或累积年龄分布CAD（Vermeesch，2007）是可视化直观表述多个年龄概率分布的最直接方法。 CAD是一种步进函数，用于根据年龄的数值设置年龄的排序：

CAD(t) = ∑i 1(t < ti)/n (eq. 1)

where 1(*) = 1如果*为true，则1（*）= 0，如果*为false。 CADs具有两个理想的特征。首先，它们不需要对数据进任何预处理或平滑。而直方图或Kernel密度估计则并非如此。其次，很容易在同一图上叠加多个CAD。非常方便进行多个样品的比对。 CAD的解释很简单，但并不是很直观。各个年龄峰值的突出程度与CAD的陡度成正比。这与直方图之类的概率密度估计不同，直方图中的该年龄的峰值突出。可以确定的是，识别峰值比识别拐点更容易，这可能是CAD没有概率密度估计使用那么广泛的原因。但是，密度估计值的易于解释是有前提的，它们需要平滑并且不能像CAD那样容易地进行合并。
en:
Empirical cumulative distribution functions or cumulative age distributions CADs (Vermeesch, 2007) are the most straightforward way to visualise the probability distribution of multiple dates. A CAD is a step function that sets out the rank order of the dates against their numerical value:

CAD(t) = ∑i 1(t < ti)/n (eq. 1)

where 1(*) = 1 if * is true and 1(*) = 0 if * is false. CADs have two desirable properties. First, they do not require any pre-treatment or smoothing of the data. This is not the case for histograms or kernel density estimates. Second, it is easy to superimpose several CADs on the same plot. This facilitates the intercomparison of multiple samples. The interpretation of CADs is straightforward but not very intuitive. The prominence of individual age components is proportional to the steepness of the CAD. This is different from probability density estimates such as histograms, in which such components stand out as peaks. It is arguably easier to identify peaks than inflection points and this probably why CADs are not as widely used as probability density estimates. But the ease of interpretation of density estimates comes at a cost, as they require smoothing and cannot as easily be combined as CADs.

cn: 协和图是一种评估U-Pb数据内部一致性的方法。 它列出了测得的<sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U- 和<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>-之间的比值（“Wetherill”图），或者等效于<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb-和<sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>U-的比值（“ Tera-Wasserburg”图）。 协和的同位素由空间由曲线（“协和线”）进行标记。 同位素比率测量值显示为100(1-α)%置信椭圆，α 可在<tt> Options </ tt>菜单中进行设置。 协和年龄投影在协和线附近或与其重叠，代表了可靠年代的峰值。 远离协和线但线性分布形成等时线（或“不一致”线）的样品可用于推断非放射性（“通用”）铅的组成或限定铅丢失的时间。
en: The concordia diagram is a graphical means of assessing the internal consistency of U-Pb data. It sets out the measured <sup>206</sup>Pb/<sup>238</sup>U- and <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>-ratios against each other ('Wetherill' diagram) or, equivalently, the <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>206</sup>Pb- and <sup>207</sup>Pb/<sup>235</sup>U-ratios ('Tera-Wasserburg' diagram). The space of concordant isotopic compositions is marked by a curve, the 'concordia line'. Isotopic ratio measurements are shown as 100(1-α)% confidence ellipses, where α is set in the <tt>Options</tt> menu. Concordant samples plot near to, or overlap with, the concordia line. They represent the pinnacle of geochronological robustness. Samples that plot away from the concordia line but are aligned along a linear trend form an isochron (or 'discordia' line) that can be used to infer the composition of the non-radiogenic ('common') lead or to constrain the timing of prior lead loss.

cn: 使用Ludwig(1998)算法获得年龄的极大似然估算值.
en: the Maximum Likelihood estimate of the age using the algorithm of Ludwig (1998).

cn: 合适自由度下t的studentised 100(1-α)% 置信区间.
en: the studentised 100(1-α)% confidence interval for t using the appropriate number of degrees of freedom.

cn: 过度离散时t的100(1-α)% 近似置信区间, z = y√MSWD.
en: the approximate 100(1-α)% confidence interval for t with overdispersion, calculated as z = y√MSWD.
the Mean Square of the Weighted Deviates (MSWD) for concordance.

cn: 协和性+等价性的卡方检测p值.
en: the Chi-squared p-value for concordance + equivalence.

cn: 合适自由度下tstudentised 100(1-α)% 置信区间。
en: the studentised 100(1-α)% confidence interval for t using the appropriate number of degrees of freedom.

cn: 使用 Ludwig (1998)算法时年龄和初始Pb比值 的极大似然 最小方差估算.
en: the Maximum Likelihood least squares estimate of the age or initial Pb-ratio using the algorithm of Ludwig (1998).

cn: 过度离散时t的100(1-α)% 近似置信区间, z = y√MSWD. (仅当MSWD>1时显示)
en: the approximate 100(1-α)% confidence interval for t with overdispersion, calculated as z = y√MSWD. (only reported if MSWD > 1)
the Mean Square of the Weighted Deviates (MSWD) for the isochron fit.

cn: 等时线拟合的卡方检测p值.
en: the Chi-squared p-value for the isochron fit.

cn: 真实下交点年龄近似高斯地质散射的估算标准偏差.
en: the estimated standard deviation of the assumedly Gaussian geological scatter of the true intercept ages.

cn: 碎屑年龄在表格中每一列的长度可能不同。样品的名称可以放在第一行。如果忽略样品名，请在选项菜单中取消选中“第一行样品名称?”
en: The detrital ages arranged in columns which may have unequal lengths. Sample names may be provided in the first row. If they are omitted, then please untick the "Sample names on first row?" box in the Options menu.

cn: Th-U演化图是一个将234U / 238U活性比对230Th / 238U活性比以误差椭圆形式（100 [1-α]％置信度绘制）表现的散点图，并将初始234U / 238U活性比和年龄显示为一组相交线。 Th-U演化图与U-Pb协和图具有相似的目的和外观，均同时显示元素组成和年龄。 另一种替换方法是做234U / 238U-比率对230Th / 234U-238U-年龄演化图。 在两种类型的演化图中，IsoplotR都提供了沿最佳拟合等时线投影原始测量值的选项，从而消除了碎屑230Th的含量。如MSWD所量化的，该程序允许对数据集内的均匀程度进行视觉评估。
en: The Th-U evolution diagram is a scatter plot that sets out the <sup>234</sup>U/<sup>238</sup>U-activity ratios against the <sup>230</sup>Th/<sup>238</sup>U-activity ratios as error ellipses (drawn at 100[1-α]% confidence level), and displays the initial <sup>234</sup>U/<sup>238</sup>U-activity ratios and ages as a set of intersecting lines. The Th-U evolution diagram has a similar and purpose and appearance as the U-Pb concordia diagram, which also displays compositions and dates simultaneously. An alternative way of doing so is to plot the <sup>234</sup>U/<sup>238</sup>U-ratios against the <sup>230</sup>Th/<sup>234</sup>U-<sup>238</sup>U-ages. In both types of evolution diagrams, <tt>IsoplotR</tt> provides the option to project the raw measurements along the best fitting isochron line and thereby remove the detrital <sup>230</sup>Th-component. This procedure allows a visual assessment of the degree of homogeneity within a dataset, as is quantified by the MSWD.

cn: Th-U演化图与U-Pb协和图具有相似的目的和外观，均同时显示元素组成和年龄。对于<sup> 234 </ sup> U和<sup> 238 </ sup> U处于长期平衡状态的火成岩数据，<tt> IsoplotR </ tt>生成一个带有一组扇形等时线（Osmond-style）的等时线图。
en: The Th-U evolution diagram has a similar and purpose and appearance as the U-Pb concordia diagram, which also displays compositions and dates simultaneously. For igneous datasets, in which <sup>234</sup>U and <sup>238</sup>U are in secular equilibrium, <tt>IsoplotR</tt> produces an (Osmond-style) isochron plot that is decorated with a fanning set of isochrone lines.

cn: 利用适当的自由度数计算t的studentised 100(1-α)% 置信区间.
en: the studentised 100(1-α)% confidence interval for t using the appropriate number of degrees of freedom.

cn: 过度分散的t的近似100(1-α)% 置信区间，计算为z = y√MSWD.
en: the approximate 100(1-α)% confidence interval for t with overdispersion, calculated as z = y√MSWD.

cn: 通过线性回归获得的初始(234U/238U) excess (230Th/232Th)(234U / 238U) 比值
en: the initial (234U/238U) excess (230Th/232Th)-ratio obtained by linear regression.

cn: 合适自由度下i的近似100(1-α)%置信区间.
en: the 100(1-α)% confidence interval for i using the appropriate number of degrees of freedom.

The diameter of the LA-ICP-MS laser spot, in μm

cn: 通过LA-ICP-MS测量的铀浓度（对于ζ-校准方法和绝对方法均以ppm为单位）或U / Ca-比值（仅对于ζ-校准方法而言）

cn:
所有可能的U-Th-He组成的空间都符合三元图或“直升机图”的框架（Vermeesch，2008，2010）。如果还包括Sm，则它将扩展为三维四面体空间（Vermeesch，2008年）。符合这些框架数据的常规统计分析存在很多理论和实践问题，可通过进行简单的对数转换（Aitchison，1982，1986）

u ≡ ln[U/He],   v ≡ ln[Th/He]   (, w ≡ ln[Sm/He]) (eq. 1)

，然后进行所需的统计分析（平均，不确定性传播等）来解决这些问题。 （Vermeesch，2008，2010）。完成这些数学运算后，可使用对数转换反演

[He] = 1/[eu+ev+(ew)+1];   [U] = eu/[eu+ev+(ew)+1];  
[Th] = ev/[eu+ev+(ew)+1];   ([Sm] = ew/[eu+ev+(ew)+1];  ) (eq. 2)

where [He] + [U] + [Th] (+ [Sm]) = 1. 将结果投图到U-Th-（Sm）/ He空间。在U-Th-（Sm）/ He测年的背景下，中心年龄定义为对应于对数空间中算术平均组成的年龄，该年龄等于组成该数据空间的几何平均年龄（Vermeesch，2008年）。 helioplot 函数以三元图或二元ln [Th / U] vs. ln [U / He]等值线线图的形式可视化U-Th-（Sm）-He数据。这些图提供了一种方便的方法，可以同时显示样品的同位素组成及其时间顺序。在这方面，它们实现了U-Pb协和图和U系列演变图同样的目的。
en:
The space of all possible U-Th-He compositions fits within the constraints of a ternary diagram or 'helioplot' (Vermeesch, 2008, 2010). If Sm is included as well, then this expands to a three-dimensional tetrahaedral space (Vermeesch, 2008). Conventional statistical analysis of data that fit within these constrained spaces is fraught with theoretical and practical problems that can be solved by applying a simple logratio transformation (Aitchison, 1982, 1986)

u ≡ ln[U/He],   v ≡ ln[Th/He]   (, w ≡ ln[Sm/He]) (eq. 1)

and then performing the desired statistical analysis (averaging, uncertainty propagation, ...) on the transformed data (Vermeesch, 2008, 2010). Upon completion of these mathematical operations, the results can then be mapped back to U-Th-(Sm)/He space using an inverse logratio transformation:

[He] = 1/[eu+ev+(ew)+1];   [U] = eu/[eu+ev+(ew)+1];  
[Th] = ev/[eu+ev+(ew)+1];   ([Sm] = ew/[eu+ev+(ew)+1];  ) (eq. 2)

where [He] + [U] + [Th] (+ [Sm]) = 1. In the context of U-Th-(Sm)/He dating, the central age is defined as the age that corresponds to the arithmetic mean composition in logratio space, which is equivalent to the geometric mean in compositional dataspace (Vermeesch, 2008). The helioplot function visualises U-Th-(Sm)-He data on either a ternary diagram or a bivariate ln[Th/U] vs. ln[U/He] contour plot. These diagrams provide a convenient way to simultaneously display the isotopic composition of samples as well as their chronological meaning. In this respect, they fulfil the same purpose as the U-Pb concordia diagram and the U-series evolution plot.

cn: 中心年龄, 定义为log(U/He)-log(Th/He)体系中的加权平均组成U-Th-He年龄。
en: the central age, which is defined as the U-Th-He age corresponding to the weighted mean composition in log(U/He)-log(Th/He) space.

cn: 用最大似然法估计的t的估计标准偏差。
en: the estimated standard deviation of t, estimated by the method of maximum likelihood.

cn: the studentised 100(1-α)% t的置信区间 选用合适的自由度.
en: the studentised 100(1-α)% confidence interval for t using the appropriate number of degrees of freedom.

cn: 应用于过度离散的t的合适的100(1-α)%自由度, 由z = y√ 加权平均方差计算而来.
en: the approximate 100(1-α)% confidence interval for t with overdispersion, calculated as z = y√MSWD.

cn: U-Th-He 测量的等效组分的加权平均方差 (MSWD)。MSWD >> 1 代表年龄相对于给定的分析误差是过度离散的。
en: the Mean Square of the Weighted Deviates (MSWD) of compositional equivalence for the U-Th-He measurements. MSWD values >> 1 indicate that the ages are overdispersed with respect to the stated analytical uncertainties.

cn: 等效几何平均成分的Chi-sqaured p值. p值<<0.05代表年龄相对于给定的分析误差是过度离散的.
en: the Chi-squared p-value of equivalence for the geometric mean composition. p-values << 0.05 indicate that the ages are overdispersed with respect to the stated analytical uncertainties.

cn: 用于解释相对于给定分析误差的过度离散的U-Th-(Sm)-He组分时的 U/He, Th/He (以及 Sm/He) 比值的 'geological scatter' 的标准差.
en: the estimated standard deviation of the 'geological scatter' of the U/He, Th/He (and Sm/He) ratios required to explain the overdispersion of the U-Th-(Sm)-He compositions with respect to the stated analytical uncertainties.

cn: 等时线是高准度，高精度地球年代学的重要工具。给定单个样品的几个等分试样，它们可使子核素的非放射成分得以量化，并与放射成分区分。在最简单的形式中，等时线可由以下方式获得：通过将放射性子体核素同位素与放射性母体同位素相对应，将二者标准化为子元素的非放射性同位素，并通过最小二乘回归Nicolaysen（1961）拟合通过这些点的直线）。然后，斜率和截距分别代表放射源子母比和非放射源子体核素的组成。 IsoplotR提供了三种拟合等时线的方法： 模型1：最大似然回归法，使用Ludwig和Titterington（1994）的最大似然公式。假定数据点之间的分散仅由分析误差引起，该算法考虑了分析不确定性和误差相关性。如果这一假设正确，则MSWD值应近似等于1。如果MSWD> 1，则模型1回归假设低估了分析不确定性√MSWD。 模型2：普通最小二乘回归，忽略了分析的不确定性。 模型3：过度分散的最大似然回归。除了将任何过度分散（MSWD> 1）归因于低估的分析不确定性之外，还可以将其归因于地质不确定性的存在，这本身表现为一个附加的（协）方差项。'
en:
Isochrons are an important instrument of high precision, high accuracy geochronology. Given several aliquots from a single sample, they allow the non-radiogenic component of the daughter nuclide to be quantified and separated from the radiogenic component. In its simplest form, the isochron is obtrained by setting out the radiogenic daughter isotope against the radioactive parent isotope, both normalised to a non-radiogenic isotope of the daughter element, and fitting a straight line through these points by least squares regression Nicolaysen (1961). The slope and intercept then yield the radiogenic daughter-parent ratio and the non-radiogenic daughter composition, respectively. IsoplotR offers three ways to fit an isochron:
  1. Model-1: maximum Likelihood regression, using the modified error weighted least squares algorithm of York et al. (2004) Maximum Likelihood formulation of Ludwig and Titterington (1994) .  This algorithm takes into account the analytical uncertainties and error correlations, under the assumption that the scatter between the data points is solely caused by the analytical uncertainty. If the assumption is correct, then the MSWD value should be approximately equal to one. If MSWD > 1, then model-1 regression assumes that the analytical uncertainties have been underestimated by a factor √MSWD.
  2. Model-2: ordinary least squares regression, ignoring the analytical uncertainties.
  3. Model-3: maximum likelihood regression with overdispersion. Instead of attributing any overdispersion (MSWD > 1) to underestimated analytical uncertainties, one can also attribute it to the presence of geological uncertainty, which manifests itself as an added (co)variance term.

cn: 使用适当数量的自由度求出t的100（1-α）％的置信区间。
en: the studentised 100(1-α)% confidence interval for t using the appropriate number of degrees of freedom.

en: the approximate 100(1-α)% confidence interval for t with overdispersion, calculated as z = y√MSWD.

en: the initial  (207Pb/204Pb) (40Ar/36Ar) (234U/238U) excess (230Th/232Th) isotope-ratio obtained by linear regression.

en: the approximate 100(1-α)% confidence interval for u with overdispersion, calculated as z = y√MSWD (only reported if MSWD > 1).

cn: 线性拟合的加权平均方根 (MSWD). MSWD值>> 1表示相对于所述分析不确定性而言, 年龄过于分散.
en: the Mean Square of the Weighted Deviates (MSWD) for the linear fit. MSWD values >> 1 indicate that the ages are overdispersed with respect to the stated analytical uncertainties.

cn: 线性拟合的Chi-squared p值. p值<< 0.05表示相对于所述分析不确定性, 年龄过于分散.
en: the Chi-squared p-value for the linear fit. p-values << 0.05 indicate that the ages are overdispersed with respect to the stated analytical uncertainties.

cn: y轴截距的多余（“地质”）散度，即描述真实非放射成分的假定高斯分布的标准偏差。
en: the excess ('geological') dispersion of the y-intercept, i.e. the standard deviation of the assumedly Gaussian distribution that describes the true non-radiogenic component.

cn: 协和截距年龄的多余（“地质”）散度, 即描述真实年龄可变性的假定高斯分布的标准偏差.
en: the excess ('geological') dispersion of the concordia intercept age, i.e. the standard deviation of the assumedly Gaussian distribution that describes the variability of the true ages.

cn: IsoplotR使用三组比值的冗余来计算各自测量误差的相关性.
en: IsoplotR uses the redundancy of the three ratios to calculate the correlation between their respective analytical uncertainties.

cn: 直方图通过合并来平滑数据。 IsoplotR使用Sturges规则（log2 [n] +1，其中n是数据点的数量）作为直方图箱的默认数量，但是用户可以将其更改为任何其他自然数。另外，kernel density estimates KDEs（Vermeesch，2012）通过应用（高斯）kernel来平滑数据： KDE（t）= ∑iN（t |μ= ti，σ= h [t]）（等式1） 其中N（μ，σ）是在均值μ和标准偏差σ的正态分布下观测值t的概率。 h [t] kernel density estimate的平滑因子或“带宽”，它可能取决于年龄t，也可能与年龄t无关。如果h [t]依赖于t，则KDE（t）被称为“自适应” KDE。 IsoplotR使用的默认带宽是使用Botev et al. (2010)的算法计算的并且利用Abramson （1982年）的自适应平滑方法进行调谐。kernel density estimates的基本原理是在采样分布的峰值附近使用较窄的带宽（顺序日期在时间上紧密分布），而在分布稀疏的采样槽中使用较宽的带宽。因此，根据数据可用性优化了密度估计的分辨率。kernel density estimates不应与Isoplot的'probability density plots' (PDPs)混淆。 PDP的数学定义与KDE的数学定义非常相似，唯一的区别是等式1中的分析不确定性s [ti]替代了带宽h [t]。这种外观和定义上的相似之处是造成大量混淆的根源。 PDP无法经受进一步的统计分析（请参阅Vermeesch，2012年提供的反例），因此未在IsoplotR中实现。
en:
Histograms smooth data by binning. IsoplotR uses Sturges' Rule (log2[n]+1, where n is the number of data points) as the default number of histogram bins, but this can be changed to any other natural number by the user. Alternatively, kernel density estimates KDEs (Vermeesch, 2012) smooth data by applying a (Gaussian) kernel:

KDE(t) = ∑iN (t | μ=ti, σ=h[t]) (eq. 1)

where N(μ,σ) is the probability of observing a value t under a Normal distribution with mean μ and standard deviation σ. h[t] is the smoothing parameter or 'bandwidth' of the kernel density estimate which may or may not depend on the age t. If h[t] depends on t, then KDE(t) is known as an 'adaptive' KDE. The default bandwidth used by IsoplotR is calculated using the algorithm of Botev et al. (2010) and modulated by the adaptive smoothing approach of Abramson (1982). The rationale behind adaptive kernel density estimation is to use a narrower bandwidth near the peaks of the sampling distribution (where the ordered dates are closely spaced in time), and a wider bandwidth in the distribution's sparsely sampled troughs. Thus, the resolution of the density estimate is optimised according to data availability. Kernel density estimates are not to be confused with Isoplot's 'probability density plots' (PDPs). The mathematical definition of a PDP closely resembles that of the KDE, the only difference being the substitution of the bandwidth h[t] by the analytical uncertainty s[ti] in Equation 1. This similarity in appearance and definition is the source of much confusion. PDPs do not stand up to further statistical scrutiny (see counter-examples provided by Vermeesch, 2012), and are not implemented in IsoplotR.

cn: 其中N（μ，σ）是在均值μ和标准偏差σ的正态分布下观测值t的概率。 h [t]是内核密度估计值的平滑参数或“带宽”，它可能取决于年龄t，也可能不取决于年龄t。如果h [t]依赖于t，则KDE（t）被称为“自适应” KDE。 IsoplotR使用的默认带宽是使用Botev等人的算法计算的。 （2010年）和艾布拉姆森（1982年）的自适应平滑方法进行调制。自适应核密度估计的基本原理是在采样分布的峰值附近使用较窄的带宽（顺序日期在时间上紧密间隔），而在分布稀疏的采样槽中使用较宽的带宽。因此，根据数据可用性优化了密度估计的分辨率。内核密度估计值不应与Isoplot的“概率密度图”（PDP）混淆。 PDP的数学定义与KDE的数学定义非常相似，唯一的区别是等式1中的分析不确定性s [ti]替代了带宽h [t]。这种外观和定义上的相似之处是造成大量混淆的根源。 PDP无法经受进一步的统计审查（请参阅Vermeesch，2012年提供的反例），并且IsoplotR中未实现。

en: Analytical uncertainty of the Lu concentration, in ppm.
Analytical uncertainty of the Hf concentration, in ppm.

cn: IsoplotR使用这些数据来计算176Lu/177Hf比值和 176Hf/177Hf与176Lu/177Hf的误差相关性。
en: IsoplotR uses these data to calculate the 176Lu/177Hf-ratios and the correlation between the 176Hf/177Hf- and the 176Lu/177Hf-uncertainties.

cn: Multidimensional Scaling（MDS）是一种降维技术，它以对象之间成对的“差异”矩阵（例如碎屑年龄分布）作为输入，并生成两个（或更高）的坐标位型作为输出，这样这些坐标之间的欧几里得距离近似于输入矩阵的差异性。因此，MDS位型起着“图”的作用，其中相似的样品紧密地聚集在一起，而不同的样品分开很远。在碎屑年代学的研究中，样品之间的差异由年龄分布之间的统计距离给出。有很多方法可以定义此统计距离。 IsoplotR使用Kolmogorov-Smirnov（KS）统计信息来实现此目的，因为其简单，并且在数学意义上，它表现为就像一个真实的距离（Vermeesch，2013，2018）。 KS距离与CAD图密切相关。它由两个CAD步骤功能之间的最大垂直距离给出。因此，KS距离介于零（两个年龄分布之间完全匹配）和一（两个年龄分布之间没有重叠）之间。同时计算两个样本之间的KS距离，将填充一个具有正值和零对角线的对称不相似矩阵。 IsoplotR实现了两种算法，可以将该矩阵转换为位型。第一种（“经典” MDS）方法使用一系列基本矩阵操作来实现KS距离和MDS位型上拟合距离之间的线性拟合。第二种更复杂的（“非度量” MDS）方法在拟合位型之前将输入距离转换为f： δi，j = f（KSi，j） 其中KSi，j是样本i和j之间的KS距离（对于1≤i≠j≤n），而δi，j是“视差”。然后，拟合MDS位型会涉及找到视差转换，该视差转换将使视差与拟合距离之间的拟合优度最大化（或使“应力”最小化）。后两个数值也可以绘制为“ Shepard图”。这些MDS算法的其他选项和更高阶替代方案在单独的无缘R软件包中（Vermeesch等，2016）。
en:
Multidimensional Scaling (MDS) is a dimension-reducting technique that takes a matrix of pairwise 'dissimilarities' between objects (e.g., detrital age distributions) as input and produces a configuration of two (or higher-) coordinates as output, so that the Euclidean distance between these coordinates approximates the dissimilarities of the input matrix. Thus, an MDS-configuration serves as a 'map' in which similar samples cluster closely together and dissimilar samples plot far apart. In the context of detrital geochronology, the dissimilarity between samples is given by the statistical distance between age distributions. There are many ways to define this statistical distance. IsoplotR uses the Kolmogorov-Smirnov (KS) statistic for this purpose due to its simplicity and the fact that it behaves like a true distance in the mathematical sense of the word (Vermeesch, 2013, 2018). The KS-distance is closely related to the CAD-plot. It is given by the maximum vertical distance between two CAD step functions. Thus, the KS-distance takes on values between zero (perfect match between two age distributions) and one (no overlap between two distributions). Calculating the KS-distance between samples two at a time populates a symmetric dissimilarity matrix with positive values and a zero diagonal. IsoplotR implements two algorithms to convert this matrix into a configuration. The first ('classical' MDS) approach uses a sequence of basic matrix manipulations to achieve a linear fit between the KS-distances and the fittted distances on the MDS configuration. The second, more sophisticated ('nonmetric' MDS) approach subjects the input distances to a transformation f prior to fitting a configuration:

δi,j = f(KSi,j)

where KSi,j is the KS-distance between samples i and j (for 1 ≤ i ≠ j ≤ n) and δi,j is the 'disparity'. Fitting an MDS configuration then involves finding the disparity transformation that maximises the goodness of fit (or minimises the 'stress') between the disparities and the fitted distances. The latter two quantities can also be plotted against each other as a 'Shepard plot'. Additional options and higher order alternatives to these MDS algorithms are provided in a separate R-package called provenance (Vermeesch et al., 2016).

cn: 用来隐藏或者忽视等分（aliquots）的可选择变量。Aliquots被标记为（小写）'<tt>x</tt>'并投图但忽略加权平均计算；Aliquots被标注为（大写）并且从投图和计算中剔除。
en: Optional variable used to hide or ignore aliquots. Aliquots marked as (lowercase) '<tt>x</tt>' are plotted but ignored for the weighted mean calculation; Aliquots marked as (uppercase) '<tt>X</tt>' are removed from both plots and calculations.

cn: 用来忽视等分（aliquots）的可选择变量.Aliquots被标记为'<tt>x</tt>' or '<tt>X</tt>' ，并从投图中剔除。
en: Optional variable used to ignore aliquots. Aliquots marked as '<tt>x</tt>' or '<tt>X</tt>' are removed from the plot.

cn: 径向图是双变量（xi，yi）散点图，其中： xi = 1 ∕σ（zi）和yi =（zi-zo）∕σ（zi）（对于1≤i≤n） zi是一些数据的转换，σ（zi）对应测量不确定度。例如，如果zi = log（ti），则σ（zi）=σ（ti）∕ ti。 zo是一个方便的中心值，例如加权平均值。连接径向图的原点（x = 0，y = 0）和数据点（xi，yi）的线的斜率等于zi，如果精确度够高，则沿x轴的水平距离就是度量。因此，径向图可以同时显示测量值和精度。没有其他图形方法可以同时达到这样的效果（Galbraith，1988）。这使径向图成为可视化异方差数据（即具有可变测量不确定性的数据）的首选方法。这一方法在地球科学中的传统应用是裂变径迹和光释光测年（例如，Galbraith，1990； Galbraith等，1999）。 IsoplotR将其推广到所有其他地球年代计中。'
en:
Radial plots are bivariate (xi,yi) scatterplots where:

xi = 1∕σ(zi) and yi = (zi - zo)∕σ(zi) (for 1 ≤ i ≤ n)

with zi a transformation of some data and σ(zi) the corresponding measurement uncertainty. For example, if zi = log(ti) then σ(zi) = σ(ti)∕ti. zo is a convenient central value such as the weighted mean. The slope of a line connecting the origin (x=0,y=0) of a radial plot with a data point (xi,yi) equals zi, and the horizontal distance along x-axis is a measure if its precision. Thus, the radial plot simultaneously visualises a measurement’s value and precision. No other graphical method achieves this goal with the same elegance (Galbraith, 1988). This makes the radial plot the method of choice for visualising heteroscedastic data, i.e. data with variable measurement uncertainties. Traditional applications in the Earth Sciences are fission track and luminescence dating (e.g., Galbraith, 1990; Galbraith et al., 1999). IsoplotR generalises it to all other geochronometers as well.

the central age, which is defined as eμ where μ is the mean of the following log-normal distribution:

ti ~ Norm(μ, s[ti]2 + ω2) (eq. 1)

with s[ti] the standard error of the ith (out of n) measurements, and ω the overdispersion.

cn: t的估算标准偏差，极大似然方法估算。
en: the estimated standard deviation of t, estimated by the method of maximum likelihood.

cn: 加权平均方差又名简化的卡氏（Chi-squared）统计。MSWD>1表明考虑中的数据组相对分析误差过度离散。
en: the Mean Square of the Weighted Deviates a.k.a. the reduced Chi-squared statistic. MSWD values greater than unity suggest that the dataset under consideration is overdispersed with respect to the analyical uncertainties.

cn: 均一性卡氏概率的p值。p数值较高（比如：p>0.05）表明没有足够证据表明过度离散。
en: the p-value of a Chi-square probability for homogeneity. High values of p (>0.05, say) indicate that there is not enough evidence for overdispersion.

cn: 公式一定义的过度离散。
IsoplotR使用这些数据计算87Rb/86Sr比值和87Sr/86Sr与87Rb/86Sr的误差相关性。
en: IsoplotR uses these data to calculate the 87Rb/86Sr-ratios and the correlation between the 87Sr/86Sr- and the 87Rb/86Sr-uncertainties.
Analytical uncertainty of the Rb concentration, in ppm
Analytical uncertainty of the Sr concentration, in ppm

cn:
Isoplot提供三种方式来直线拟合具有分析误差的二维数据：
  1. 模型-1：极大似然回归，使用York et al. (2004)改进的误差加权最小二乘法。基于数据点的离散仅被分析误差所导致的假设，该算法同时考虑分析误差和误差相关性。如果该假设是正确的，MSWD应该近似等于1。如果MSWD>1，模型-1回归假定分析误差被低估至 √MSWD。
  2. 模型-2：普通最小二乘回归，不考虑分析误差。
  3. 模型-3：过度离散的极大似然回归。不是将任何过度离散（MSWD>1）归因于低估的分析误差，也可以将它归因于目前存在的地质误差，表明它本身是一个额外的变量因素。
en:
IsoplotR offers three ways to fit a straight line through 2-dimensional data with measurement uncertainties:
  1. Model-1: maximum Likelihood regression, using the modified error weighted least squares algorithm of York et al. (2004) This algorithm takes into account the analytical uncertainties and error correlations, under the assumption that the scatter between the data points is solely caused by the analytical uncertainty. If the assumption is correct, then the MSWD value should be approximately equal to one. If MSWD > 1, then model-1 regression assumes that the analytical uncertainties have been underestimated by a factor √MSWD.
  2. Model-2: ordinary least squares regression, ignoring the analytical uncertainties.
  3. Model-3: maximum likelihood regression with overdispersion. Instead of attributing any overdispersion (MSWD > 1) to underestimated analytical uncertainties, one can also attribute it to the presence of geological uncertainty, which manifests itself as an added (co)variance term.
the slope of the best fit line.

cn: 合适自由度下s的100(1-α)%置信区间。
en: the 100(1-α)% confidence interval for s using the appropriate number of degrees of freedom.

cn: 过度离散下s的近似100(1-α)%置信区间，其中z=y√MSWD。
en: the approximate 100(1-α)% confidence interval for s with overdispersion, calculated as z = y√MSWD.
the y-intercept obtained by linear regression.

cn: 合适自由度下i的100(1-α)%置信区间。
en: the 100(1-α)% confidence interval for i using the appropriate number of degrees of freedom.

cn: 过度离散下i的近似100(1-α)%置信区间，其中z=y√MSWD（当MSWD>1时报道）。
en: the approximate 100(1-α)% confidence interval for i with overdispersion, calculated as z = y√MSWD (only reported if MSWD > 1).

cn: 线性拟合的加权平均方差（MSWD）。对于特定的分析误差，MSWD值>>1标明数据过度离散。
en: the Mean Square of the Weighted Deviates (MSWD) for the linear fit. MSWD values >> 1 indicate that the data are overdispersed with respect to the stated analytical uncertainties.

cn: 线性拟合的Chi-squared p值。p<<0.05表明对于固定的分析误差数据过于离散。
en: the Chi-squared p-value for the linear fit. p-values << 0.05 indicate that the data are overdispersed with respect to the stated analytical uncertainties.

cn: IsoplotR使用这些数据计算187Re/188Os比值和187Os/188Os与187Re/188Os的误差相关性。
en: IsoplotR uses these data to calculate the 187Re/188Os-ratios and the correlation between the 187Os/188Os- and the 187Re/188Os-uncertainties.
Analytical uncertainty of the Re concentration, in ppm
Analytical uncertainty of the Os concentration, in ppm

cn: 裂变径迹年龄由下公式给出： t = ln [1 + {2Nsλ238λf} / {[238U] AsL}] /λ238（式1） 其中Ns是在面积As上测量的自发裂变径迹的数量，[238U]是单位体积中原子的238U浓度，λf是裂变衰减常数，L是可蚀刻的裂变径迹长度，因子2是a几何参数，代表蚀刻从内部晶体表面的上方和下方都显示出轨迹。 [238U]可以使用中子辐照的235U的诱导裂变作为238U的代用品间接测量。在这种方法的最常见实例中，诱发的裂变径迹由附着在抛光的矿物表面的由云母或塑料制成的外部探测器记录（Fleischer和Hart，1972； Hurford和Green，1983）。裂变径迹年龄方程变为： t = ln [1 + {λ238ζρdNs} / {2 Ni}] /λ238（式2） 其中Ni是在与自然轨道相同的区域中在外部探测器中计数的诱导裂变轨道的数量，ζ是结合了裂变衰减常数和可蚀刻裂变轨道长度的“ zeta”校准因子，而ρd是在已知U浓度的共辐照玻璃中计算出的每单位面积诱发裂变径迹的数量。 ρd可使ζ因子在两次辐射之间的“循环”。
en:
The fission track age is given by:

t = ln[1 +  {2 Nsλ238λf}/ {[238U]AsL}] / λ238 (eq. 1)

where Ns is the number of spontaneous fission tracks measured over an area As, [238U] is the 238U-concentration in atoms per unit volume, λf is the fission decay constant, L is the etchable fission track length, and the factor 2 is a geometric factor accounting for the fact that etching reveals tracks from both above and below the internal crystal surface.

[238U] can be measured indirectly using the induced fission of neutron-irradiated 235U as a proxy for the 238U. In the most common implementation of this approach, the induced fission tracks are recorded by an external detector made of mica or plastic that is attached to the polished grain surface (Fleischer and Hart, 1972; Hurford and Green, 1983). The fission track age equation then becomes:

t = ln[ 1 + {λ238ζρdNs}/ {2 Ni}] / λ238 (eq. 2)

where Ni is the number of induced fission tracks counted in the external detector over the same area as the spontaneous tracks, ζ is a 'zeta'-calibration factor that incorporates both the fission decay constant and the etchable fission track length, and ρd is the number of induced fission tracks per unit area counted in a co-irradiated glass of known U-concentration. ρd allows the ζ-factor to be 'recycled' between irradiations.
The 238U-concentration can also be measured directly by LAICPMS. Unfortunately the accuracy of LAICPMS-based age estimates is compromised by the absence of matrix-matched concentrations standards, and uncertainies associated with the fission track decay constant and the etching and counting efficiencies. These systematic errors can be removed by normalising to a standard of known fission track age and defining a new 'zeta' calibration constant ζicp:

t = ln( 1 + {2 ζicp λ238N2}/ {[238U] As})/ λ238 (eq. 2)

where [238U] may either stand for the 238U-concentration (in ppm) or for the U/Ca (for apatite) or U/Si (for zircon) ratio measurement, and As is the spontaneous track counting area, which may either correspond to one laser spot or to a larger area (if multiple U-measurements were made).

cn: IsoplotR使用这些数据来计算147Sm/144Nd比值和147Sm/144Nd与143Nd/144Nd的误差相关性。
en: IsoplotR uses these data to calculate the 147Sm/144Nd-ratios and the correlation between the 147Sm/144Nd- and the 143Nd/144Nd-uncertainties.
Analytical uncertainty of the Sm concentration, in ppm
Analytical uncertainty of the Nd concentration, in ppm

cn: <sup>40</sup>Ar/<sup>39</sup>Ar年龄谱是可视化逐步加热测量过程的有用工具。它是基于沿水平轴随着温度升高而形成的的不同加热各阶段的加权平均投图，不同样品块宽度等比例对应的<sup>39</sup>Ar量。<tt>IsoplotR</tt>将坪年龄定义为符合改良版Chauvenet标准连续加热各阶最长序列（就累计的<sup>39</sup>Ar含量而言）的加权平均年龄。这个定义不同于<tt>Isoplot</tt>的定义 (Ludwig, 2003)， 并更加简单 。然而，值得注意的是，年龄坪并没有一个绝对的定义，因此不能用于定量参考。这些坪有可能表现出过量的过度离散。通过可选的<tt>omit</tt>列移除某个或某些加热阶段可以手动减小离散程度。
en: The <sup>40</sup>Ar/<sup>39</sup>Ar-age spectrum is a useful tool to visualise stepwise heating measurements. Its appearance is based on the weighted mean plot with the different heating steps arranged in order of increasing temperature along the horizontal axis, and the width of the different sample boxes proportional to the corresponding amounts of <sup>39</sup>Ar. <tt>IsoplotR</tt> defines the 'plateau age' as the weighted mean age of the longest sequence (in terms of cumulative <sup>39</sup>Ar content) of consecutive heating steps that pass a modified Chauvenet criterion. This definition is different (and simpler) than the one used by <tt>Isoplot</tt> (Ludwig, 2003). However, it is important to mention that all definitions of an age plateau are heuristic by nature and should therefore not be used for quantitative inference. It is possible (and likely) that the plateau exhibits significant overdispersion. This overdispersion can be manually reduced by removing individual heating steps using the optional <tt>omit</tt> column.

cn: 坪年龄，即各阶段最大连续组的加权平均年龄，这些阶段符合用于普通加权平均的改良版Chauvenet标准。
en: the plateau age, which is defined as the weighted mean age of the largest consecutive set of steps that survive the modified Chauvenet's Criterion used for the ordinary weighted mean.

cn: 极大似然法估计的<tt>t</tt>标准偏差
en: the estimated standard deviation of <tt>t</tt>, estimated by the method of maximum likelihood.

cn: <tt>t</tt>的100(1-α)置信区间。在投图上显示为灰色条形区。与随机不确定性相关的误差显示为深灰色，系统误差（例如：J因子和衰变常数）显示为浅灰色。
en: the 100(1-α)% confidence interval for <tt>t</tt>. This is also shown as a grey band on the plot. The uncertainties associated with the random uncertainties are shown in dark grey, whereas the systematic uncertainties (i.e. J-factor and decay constant) are shown in light grey.

cn: 坪的MSWD（又名‘简化的卡式统计’）。 只要过度离散不偏离Chauvenet的异常值标准，<tt>IsoplotR</tt>的坪定义允许允许MSWD不超过1。
en: the mean square of the weighted deviates (aka 'reduced chi-square statistic') of the plateau. <tt>IsoplotR</tt>'s plateau definition allows the MSWD to exceed 1, as long as the overdispersion does not violate Chauvenet's outlier criterion.

cn: 均一性的卡式检测的p值。 只要过度离散不偏离Chauvenet的异常值标准，<tt>IsoplotR</tt>的坪定义允许允许p值低于α 截断值。
en: p-value of a chi-square test of homogeneity. <tt>IsoplotR</tt>'s plateau definition allow the p-value to fall below the α cutoff, as long as the overdispersion does not violate Chauvenet's outlier criterion.

cn: 年龄坪中各阶段的总和。
en: the sum of all the steps that are included in the plateau.

cn: 238U/232Th和230Th/232Th的误差相关性 (可选择的)
en: Error correlation between the 238U/232Th- and 230Th/232Th-ratios (optional)

cn: 232Th/238U- and 230Th/238U误差相关性(可选择的)
en: Error correlation between the 232Th/238U- and 230Th/238U-ratios (optional)

cn: 演变图、等时线和星状图中充填颜色的可选变量.
en: Optional variable to be used as fill colours in evolution diagrams, isochrons and radial plots.

cn: He、U、Th 和 (可选择的) Sm丰度或浓度的测量值 (可使用各种原子单位，fmol、mol/g、atoms等).
en: Measured He, U, Th and (optionally) Sm abundance or concentration, in any kind of atomic units (fmol, mol/g, atoms, ...).

cn: He、U、Th和（可选择的） Sm测量误差.
en: Analytical uncertainty of the He, U, Th and (optionally) Sm measurements

cn: 星状图、三元图和对数比图充填颜色的可选变量.
en: Optional variable to be used as fill colours in radial plots, ternary diagrams and logratio plots.

cn: y截距的过度（地质）离散，例如：描述继承组分的假定高斯分布的标准偏差.
en: the excess ('geological') dispersion of the y-intercept, i.e. the standard deviation of the assumedly Gaussian distribution that describes the inherited component.

cn: Pb-Pb Ar-Ar Rb-Sr Sm-Nd Re-Os Lu-Hf U-Th-He 裂变径迹 230Th-234U-238U 230Th-238U 年龄。
en: The Pb-Pb Ar-Ar Rb-Sr Sm-Nd Re-Os Lu-Hf U-Th-He fission track 230Th-234U-238U 230Th-238U  ages.
